name: Herding Cats (SolarisDreams)
description:
The objective is to help Mildred find all her cats for feeding time, a cozy cat collection platformer with the goal of finishing in the fastest time. In order to gather all of the cats to feed them on time, Mildred must complete various environmental challenges within her home. Once Mildred approaches one of her feline companions, she will collect them.

Created for TAMU Vist 205 coursework.
